metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7875 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In wallpaper.c in feh before v2.18.3, if a malicious client pretends to be the E17 window manager, it is possible to trigger an out-of-boundary heap write while receiving an IPC message. An integer overflow leads to a buffer overflow and/or a double free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

feh - 2.23.2-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: feh package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.23.2-1build1').
